title: Stage Lv4-A4-S15
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The analysis shows that sales have increased. (business variant 1)
The data indicates a clear trend. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The analysis shows that sales have increased. (business variant 1)
The data indicates a clear trend. (business variant 1)
These factors have influenced the results. (business variant 1)
Significant improvement has been observed. (business variant 1)
Statistics demonstrate the following pattern. (business variant 1)
Growth has been achieved compared to the previous quarter. (business variant 1)
The research findings support the hypothesis. (business variant 1)
Market share has been expanded. (business variant 1)
These indicators prove the success. (business variant 1)
The prediction model has been confirmed to be accurate. (business variant 1)
